# vlc-remote

# API

```
var Remote = require('vlc-remote');
var remote = new Remote([port=8088, [host="127.0.0.1"]]);

remote.play("file_path" or ["playlist_file_path*",], function(err, body){

});


remote.stop(function(err, body){

});

```
